arts.ttl: “Playing like a bun” – Ruben Amorim decision for Manchester City slammed by pundit
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim’s decision not to throw Senne Lammens into the deep end as Manchester United take on Manchester City this weekend is the wrong one. That’s according to Johan Boskamp in Het Belang van Limburg, who can’t understand why Amorim would not use his new goalkeeper straight away. Lammens is the official new number one The post “Playing like a bun” – Ruben Amorim decision for Manchester City slammed by pundit appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: A vital player for Manchester City may return against Manchester United.
arts.sum: But as tomorrow’s clash with Manchester United draws closer, it seems that Gvardiol could return for Pep Guardiola’s side tomorrow. Manchester City has missed the presence of Josko Gvardiol on the pitch to start the 25/26 season.
